title: StereoSampleGAN
broadDescription: Lightweight machine learning approach high fidelity stereo audio sample generation.

details.point: Utilizes a novel, WGAN based model to generate stereo, time-frequency representations of audio samples.
Independent research project, continuation of UCLA COSMOS 2024 Research. Pending publishing.
Skills: Advanced ML Training Techniques, Attention/Transformers, GANs, Signal Processing, Data Representation, Data Collection, AI Research.
Leverages user writing abilities and essay deadlines to algorithmically determine best order of essay writing to maximize writing and review time without overwhelming user.
Recieved third place prize in OneHacks III Hackathon.
Skills: GitHub Action Automation, Algorithmic Problem Solving, Website Interface Design
